channel.title: iTunes Can. + gift card
channel.description: Could someone explain this to me? My gilfriend gave me an iTunes gift card as part of my christmas gift with the idea in her mind that I could use it for apps as iTunes sucks for music. The card works but not for the Canadian app store. Why is this? It doesn't say this on the card, it's very discreet and not on the main part of their site about the cards. What the fuck Apple? They gave me some bullshit about taxes. Someone please explains.

item.title: iTunes Can. + gift card
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Right you are Pwnd, but any idea why this is?

item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Well clearly America has taken its war with canda out on innocent people trying to buy apps on Canadian Itunes… Duh…

HEHE… Well um i wouldnt have thought that would matter… I mean i bought stuff of american Ebay before… although its not the same.
